text: No kuri ba bandi babaye Abayahudi, twabaziririje buri (nyamaswa) ifite inzara zitatuye, tunabaziririza urugimbu rw’inka n’intama, uretse gusa ibinure byo ku migongo yazo cyangwa ibyo mu nda, cyangwa ikinure cyivanze n’inyama y’igufa. Ibyo twabibahaniye kubera ubwigomeke bwabo. Kandi rwose turi abanyakuri
